works.title: Genetic similarity between relatives provides evidence on the presence and history of assortative mating
Assortative mating strongly increases genetic similarity between distant relatives
Assortative mating increases genetic similarity among distant relatives: evidence from polygenic scores

works.title: Multimedia resources as a support for requirements engineering and software maintenance
works.abstract: Context: Textual documentations are frequently used in the software development process to outline features and behaviors of an application. For some people, textual descriptions may not be enough to understand what is being developed. In this scenario, multimedia resources appear as an option for software documentation, providing other ways to obs...
